title: Multi-Point PC-Based Videoconferencing Technology Utilization Strategies for Nursing Education in K-12

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing knowledge and digital device usage experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design reflecting the necessity of IP-based videoconferencing technology in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can participate in real-time clinical simulation evaluations via an IP-based multipoint video conferencing system.
Learners can design remote collaboration protocols (doctor-nurse-patient role-play) using video conferencing technology.
Learners can create video conferencing-based nursing education materials applicable in smartphone environments.

resources: IP-Based Video Conferencing Software (e.g., Zoom, Microsoft Teams)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
